short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Cority layout editing by making information more visible

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1.6.1
· merged scripts, cleaned up page selection logic
· added field types

1.6.0
· added customizable colors to options page
· improved styling

1.5.0
· added options page to toggle auto-running on page load
· fixed field widths on backend
· added lookup table name to field text

1.4.0
· added feature: front-end (layouts) will show original field names and non-translated names
· improvement: added right-click lookup table values

1.3.3
· added feature: right click lookup table to view table values
· removed unused code

1.3.2
· initial commit and publication to store
